alert.note: Alert for Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:39PM CDT until May 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ECTOR AND NORTHWESTERN MIDLAND COUNTIES... At 338 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Odessa, West Odessa, Odessa Schlemeyer Field and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 107 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
